## Bio

Zy'Keyah Horn is a 21-year old born and raised in Meridian, Mississippi. Zy'Keyah graduated as Meridian High Class Valedictorian is 2018. She graduated from Mississippi State University in the Spring of 2021 with a bachelor's degree in accounting and a minor in political science. She graduated with Magna Cum Laude. She is a first generation college graduate. Upon completing her degree, Zy'Keyah accepted a position with Parker-Hannifin as a Accounting Leadership Development Associate. While working full-time, Zy'Keyah is pursuing a Master's degree in professional accountancy from Mississippi State.
